children.value: 26. Write a C program to add two matrices.

Input elements in the first matrix :
element - [0],[0] : 1 2 3
element - [0],[1] : element - [0],[2] : element - [1],[0] : 4 5 6
element - [1],[1] : element - [1],[2] : element - [2],[0] : 7 8 9
element - [2],[1] : element - [2],[2] : Input elements in the second matrix :
element - [0],[0] : 9 8 7
element - [0],[1] : element - [0],[2] : element - [1],[0] : 6 5 4
element - [1],[1] : element - [1],[2] : element - [2],[0] : 3 2 1
element - [2],[1] : element - [2],[2] :
The First matrix is :

1       2       3
4       5       6
7       8       9
The Second matrix is :

9       8       7
6       5       4
3       2       1
The Addition of two matrix is :

10      10      10
10      10      10
10      10      10
